characteristic.__text: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
If this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.
End of Any Turn
If any enemy models were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn, **Heal (D6)** this unit.
Reaction: Opponent declared a **^^Fight^^** ability for a unit in combat with this unit
Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units
Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit to be the target.

For the rest of the turn, the target unit can still use **^^Charge^^** abilities even if it used a **^^Run^^** or **^^Retreat^^** ability in the same turn. In addition, for the rest of the turn, no mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by **^^Retreat^^** abilities.
Friendly **^^Nighthaunt Infantry^^** units have **^^Ward (5+)^^** while they are wholly within 6" of a friendly **Black Coach**.
Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
Pick up to 3 enemy **^^Heroes^^** each within 12" of a different friendly **^^Nighthaunt Hero^^** to be the targets
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.
Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.
This unit can use any of the **^^Aura of Dread^^** abilities, even if it doesn’t have the required keyword(s) for that ability.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Mortalis Terminexus** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Mortalis Terminexus** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Shyish Reaper** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Shyish Reaper** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Vault of Souls** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Vault of Souls** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase

Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit that has 3 or more models and is wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to D6.
Ignore all modifiers to save rolls (positive and negative) for friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** units, excluding **Nagash**.
Reaction: Opponent declared an **^^Attack^^** ability
A friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit targeted by that **^^Attack^^** ability
That unit has **^^Ward (5+)^^** for the rest of the phase.
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

Friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** units that are in combat can use **^^Charge^^** abilities this phase. However, if a unit that is in combat uses a **^^Charge^^** ability and the charge roll is 3 or less, that unit does not count as having charged that turn.
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

Pick a friendly **^^^^**Nighthaunt War Machine^^** or **^^Cavalry^^** unit that has not used an **^^Aura of Dread^^** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.
**^^Aura of Dread^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit that has not used an **^^Aura of Dread^^** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target. The number of models in the friendly **^^Nighthaunt^^** unit must be greater than the number of models in the target unit.
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.
**^^Aura of Dread^^**
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

Pick a friendly **^^Nighthaunt Hero^^** that has not used an **^^Aura of Dread^^** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
The target has **^^Strike-last^^** for the rest of the turn.
**^^Aura of Dread^^**

entryLink._name: Knight of Shrouds on Ethereal Steed
Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
Knight of Shrouds on Ethereal Steed
Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
